about_the_game:
The demo version features

  • First 10 levels of one map
  • One starting ship, with basic modules available and only ballistic weapon type
  • Standard difficulty settings, no customization possible
  • Basic mechanics
  • Estimated amount of content for 1-2 hours of play
detailed_description:
The demo version features

  • First 10 levels of one map
  • One starting ship, with basic modules available and only ballistic weapon type
  • Standard difficulty settings, no customization possible
  • Basic mechanics
  • Estimated amount of content for 1-2 hours of play
name: Lonely tiny spaceship Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
